<Text: Crush's Coaster is a spinning roller coaster at Walt Disney Studios Park in Disneyland Paris.>

<Text: Crush's Coaster:  The attraction officially opened on June 9, 2007 as part of an expansion project in Toon Studio, an area within Walt Disney Studios Park formerly known as Animation Courtyard.>
Triplets:<Crush's Coaster
2:
--------------------
Text: Crush's Coaster:  It is themed to the Disney-Pixar film "Finding Nemo" and named after Crush, a green sea turtle character from the film.
Triplets:<Crush's Coaster

<Text: Crush's Coaster:  Most of the roller coaster is enclosed and features dark ride special effects.>
